attributes.action: People with illnesses because of their own fault should pay their medical bill.
attributes.background: Drug abuse and alcoholism cost the N.H.S. £3.5 billion a year each, smoking costs £5 billion a year, and obesity £6.5 billion a year. That is £15 billion altogether. Each taxpayer is being forced to hand £500 to help those who don't help themselves. This must end.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure how you would like the Government to define "illnesses because of their own fault". You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
